alert.note: Alert for Burke; Divide; Mountrail; Williams (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 10 at 2:26PM CST until March 11 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST SATURDAY TO 10 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Burke, Divide, Mountrail, and Williams Counties. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, from 6 PM this evening to Noon CST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from Noon CST Saturday to 10 AM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds may briefly subside Saturday, but will be increasing again Saturday evening.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family member of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
